explanation: [0-0] A gray round object is placed on a wooden table.

[0-9] A hand holds a black marker pen, places the tip on the object, and rotates the object a full turn, drawing an incomplete circle on it. Simultaneously, a red cross mark appears at the top of the screen. The scene changes to a fixed plastic pipe connector on the wooden table. A saw cuts off the plastic pipe connector, and then a hand takes the cut-off connector away. The scene changes again, showing a hand holding the plastic pipe connector with a gray brick wall in the background. A pair of needle-nose pliers reaches into the connector, clamps the black washer inside, pulls it out to the right side of the screen, and disappears. The scene changes again, showing a hand holding the plastic pipe connector and placing it onto a gray plastic pipe.

[9-13] The scene changes to a hand holding a black marker pen, placing the tip on the edge of the connector attached to the plastic pipe. The pipe rotates, drawing a circle. After removing the connector, a perfectly connected circle is visible, and a green check mark appears at the top of the screen.
